Dear Doctor Carter:
div1.p:
I wonder if you saw the enclosed letter from
George H. Finlay in the “New York Times” of February
seventh? I do not know whether you consider it of any
importance or not, but I thought that you might not
have seen the article.

It seems to me that Mr. Finlay answers his
own inquiries by pointing out that for nearly twenty
years after Doctor Finlay's discovery nothing whatever
happened, and that it was not until Reed did his work
that anything came of this hypothesis of Doctor Finlay.
It seems to me that that is the answer.

Yours very sincerely, F F Russell Doctor H. R. Carter,
